page.title: 20LAW AND ORDER IN AMMANFORD 2
page.content: They allow the Scouts and Brownies etc. to look around the Police Station when they are shown the cells, fingerprints room etc. Over the last 12 years there have been 5 murders in the Ammanford district. There are, on average, 20 suicides a year. If a serious incident occurs 2 Police dogs can be called upon and if there is a search for drugs there is a dog specially trained for the job. The local Police are worried about the mis-use of drugs in the area. As one man said "Yesterday in New York, today in London, don't let it happen tomorrow in Ammanford". This information was given in an interview with the duty inspector.
